disclaimer:
K7-Concept Karlsruhe GmbH does not guarantee that the information provided on this website is complete, correct and in any case up-to-date. 
In particular, K7-Concept Karlsruhe GmbH assumes no liability for content that is expressly or implicitly marked as third-party content. 
K7-konzept Karlsruhe GmbH is not responsible for ensuring that such content is complete, correct, up-to-date and legal and does not inadmissibly interfere with the legal interests of third parties. 
This also applies to the content of websites referred to by a link.

home.description: K7-concept Karlsruhe is a young company specializing in the construction of special machines and the development of software and hardware for industrial applications.

imprintPage.changesPossible: K7-Concept Karlsruhe GmbH reserves the right to make changes or additions to the information provided or to remove it without prior notice.
imprintPage.noClaims: Under no circumstances is K7-Concept Karlsruhe GmbH liable for damage caused by a lack of usage options or data loss in connection with the use of documents or information or the provision of services that are accessible on this website.

newsPage.soon:
Of course we already have news, but because we are so busy we haven't found time to publish them here. 
Check back in the next few days, we're working on it!

projects.selection:
Here is a selection of our most recent projects. 
Unfortunately we cannot publish all projects. 
If you would like to learn more about our projects, please contact us.

services.text:
We offer you a wide range of services. 
From design and software development to planning and simulation.

team.missing:
Sorry, we are not quite there yet when it comes to introducing our team. 
But we are working on it. 
Check back in the next few days!

wwa.customerText:
We start with your requirements and work backwards from there. 
We are careful listeners and give honest feedback. 
We get to the bottom of things.
wwa.dataSecurityText:
We are very familiar with the jungle of GDPR and Co. 
We work in every project according to the highest data protection standards.
wwa.interdisciplinaryText: Our employees not only know their area of ​​expertise, but have all worked in other departments.
wwa.softwareText:
We are constantly working to become more efficient and automate our processes. 
So that we can concentrate on the essentials.
wwa.subTitle: Who we are
wwa.text:
We are a team of engineers specializing in special machine construction and the development of software and hardware for industrial plants. 
As a development company, we not only offer design services, but also develop the associated software.
wwa.title: Not your classic engineering office
